hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Huge Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Did you know that the Boomerang instantly stuns Phantom Ganon's second form?

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Kokiri Sword# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: You're playing a Randomizer. I'm randomized!^${12 48 31}Here's a random number:  #4#.&Enjoy your Randomizer!

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #6# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a sandy grotto with #fragile walls#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Minuet of Forest#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.
